title: Heart Demon
summary: Heart Demon Manhua Li Yunxin is a human being, but what he does is comparable to a demon. 心魔 A psychiatrist in the previous life, in this life he was reincarnated as a painter who can manipulate spells, but what he can manipulate most is the human heart. Was chased and killed by Taoism, and made friends with demons. Whether it is a human or a monster, they will eventually become Li Yunxin’s chess pieces. Even the black and white Yan Jun, who took people’s souls, had to ask him when he saw him: Where did the heart demon come from? A Demonic Heart, Inner Demons, Internal Devils, Xin Mo, 심마
